participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, with a passion for justice and a love for animals.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and creative, with a deep appreciation for music and storytelling.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
